articles.title: Disney is overhauling Splash Mountain to remove Song of the South ties - Vox.com
articles.description: The Walt Disney Parks division announced Thursday that it will “completely reimagine” Splash Mountain, and that the ride’s new theme is inspired by Disney’s 2009 animated film The Princess and the Frog.
articles.content: Disneys Splash Mountain ride, the famous log flume thats popular at both the Disneyland and Disney World theme parks, is getting a facelift. And not just any ol facelift, but a major one that will fi… [+6483 chars]
